name: fibre cement facing tile production, large format | fibre cement facing tile, large format | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1136/documentation

This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of facing tiles, in a large format. Data is based on a company and data from different products (base colours & coatings) were averaged.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

From the extraction of raw materials.

The activity ends with the facing tile produced and the wastes treated. This dataset includes all the production processes, the material and energy input and the waste treatment services. The dataset doesn't include dust emissions from the production process as they are collected in filters and reused in the process, and doesn't include emissions from fuel combustion processes.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data is based on a Swiss company.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The dataset represents the current Swiss technology. The main processes are: raw tile production, drying and coating.

exchanges.description:
Facing tiles are used for:	
- cladding for external walls ventilated at rear and infills
- siding for pillars
- framework constructions, bottom of roof, parapet cladding, etc.
The technical specifications are:
Bulk density rho [kg/m3]: 1900
Thermal conductivity lamda [W/mK]: about 0.5
Weight per area [kg/m2]: 15.1 - 15.2 (used: 15.2)
Thickness [cm]: 0.8
Maximum size [mm]: 2’500/2’800/3’100 * 1’250/1’500

Further references: 
Weibel T. and Stritz A. (1995) Ökoinventare und Wirkungsbilanzen von Baumaterialien; Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Hochbaukonstruktionen. In: ESU-Reihe Nr. 1/95. Laboratorium für Energiesysteme, Eidg. Technische Hochschule (ETH), Zürich.
Starzner S. and Wurmer-Weiss P. (2000) ECOBIS 2000, ökologisches Baustoffinformationssystem.
SIA building materials declaration:
http://www.sia.ch/cf/oekoinfoliste.cfm?ID=2943702&Lang=d&Mfg=72&Grp=0&Produkt=, access date: Mai 2003
